mapper.select: /*채팅방 목록 조회*/ SELECT cr.chat_room_code , cr.user_id_code , cr.chat_room_title , cr.chat_room_content , cr.chat_room_participant , cr.chat_room_limit , cr.chat_room_reg_date , cr.chat_room_update , cr.chat_room_nickname , sub.file_code , sub.user_id_code , sub.file_orginal_name , sub.file_re_name , sub.file_main_image , sub.file_location , sub.file_size , sub.file_reg_date , sub.file_update_date , sub.file_use , sub.chat_room_code FROM tb_c_chat_room AS cr LEFT JOIN (SELECT f.file_code ,f.user_id_code ,f.file_orginal_name ,f.file_re_name ,f.file_main_image ,f.file_location ,f.file_size ,f.file_reg_date ,f.file_update_date ,f.file_use ,c.chat_room_code FROM tb_f_file AS f INNER join tb_b_rel_file_with_Chat AS c on f.file_code = c.file_code) AS sub ON sub.chat_room_code = cr.chat_room_code ORDER BY cr.chat_room_code DESC;
